content: Hi. Anyone know of development of a "Bed" Resource/Archetype/DCM? It is about Hospital Bed Capacity measures.
Possibly better posted in the openEHR stream...
Capacity measures could be something different... (as not down to the specific)
Is the question you're looking to answer "How many beds do we have available that can cater for trauma victims?"
Yes. I see the Location resource. And a reference from Encounter to Location for administration of admissions into beds. Thanks. I will read through those 2.
@Brian Postlethwaite Yes. That is one of the questions. I will dig into Location/Encounter but a quick glance gave me hope :-) Thanks.
I need to go read into the aggregation stuff as that's not standard resources...
